trans-unit.source: Defines the method message interface.
trans-unit.target: 定义方法消息接口。

trans-unit.source: A method message is used to send information to and from remote methods.
trans-unit.target: 方法消息用于将信息发送到和从远程方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, messages used for remote method calls implement the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage> interface.
trans-unit.target: 例如，用于远程方法调用的消息实现<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage>接口。

trans-unit.source: The following example code shows a custom proxy that overrides `RealProxy.Invoke` in order to write the message information to the console and return immediately without making a remote call.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例代码演示自定义代理该替代`RealProxy.Invoke`以便将消息信息写入到控制台并立即返回而不进行远程调用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of arguments passed to the method.
trans-unit.target: 获取传递给该方法的参数的数目。

trans-unit.source: The number of arguments passed to the method.
trans-unit.target: 传递给该方法的参数的数目。

trans-unit.source: The following example code shows a custom proxy that overrides `RealProxy.Invoke` in order to write the message information to the console, using the `ArgCount` property to iterate through the arguments.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例代码演示自定义代理该替代`RealProxy.Invoke`消息信息写入到控制台，以便使用`ArgCount`属性来循环访问自变量。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方通过引用接口进行调用，且没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作基础结构代码。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 要求值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;权限值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of arguments passed to the method.
trans-unit.target: 获取传递给该方法的参数数组。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> array containing the arguments passed to the method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 数组，它包含传递给该方法的参数。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage.Args%2A> property is redundant since the same functionality can be achieved through the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage.ArgCount%2A> and <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage.GetArg%2A>, there might be performance optimization available if the implementer understands when all the arguments will be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 尽管<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage.Args%2A>属性是冗余的因为可以通过实现相同的功能<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage.ArgCount%2A>和<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage.GetArg%2A>，可能有性能优化可用如果实施者了解时，将为所有自变量检索。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方通过引用接口进行调用，且没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作基础结构代码。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 要求值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;权限值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: The number of the requested argument.
trans-unit.target: 请求的参数的数目。

trans-unit.source: Gets a specific argument as an <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取作为 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 的特定参数。

trans-unit.source: The argument passed to the method.
trans-unit.target: 传递给该方法的参数。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方通过引用接口进行调用，且没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作基础结构代码。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 要求值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;权限值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: The number of the requested argument.
trans-unit.target: 请求的参数的数目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the argument passed to the method.
trans-unit.target: 获取传递给该方法的参数的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the specified argument passed to the method, or <see langword="null" /> if the current method is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 传递给该方法的指定参数的名称；如果未实现当前方法，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方通过引用接口进行调用，且没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作基础结构代码。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 要求值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;权限值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the message has variable arguments.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示消息是否具有变量参数。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the method can accept a variable number of arguments; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该方法可以接受数目可变的参数，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example code shows a custom proxy that overrides `RealProxy.Invoke` in order to write the message information to the console, including whether the method call has variable arguments.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例代码演示自定义代理该替代`RealProxy.Invoke`以便将消息信息写入到控制台，包括是否方法调用具有变量自变量。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方通过引用接口进行调用，且没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作基础结构代码。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 要求值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;权限值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext" /> for the current method call.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前方法调用的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext" /> for the current method call.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前方法调用的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example code shows how to use the `LogicalCallContext` property to determine whether any values are attached to the logical thread.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`LogicalCallContext`属性来确定是否有任何值附加到逻辑线程。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方通过引用接口进行调用，且没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作基础结构代码。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 要求值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;权限值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodBase" /> of the called method.
trans-unit.target: 获取被调用方法的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodBase" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodBase" /> of the called method.
trans-unit.target: 被调用方法的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodBase" />。

trans-unit.source: This information is not transmitted to a remote location, but is used to cache the method base after it has been looked up once.
trans-unit.target: 此信息不会传送到远程位置，但用于后它已查找一次缓存方法基。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方通过引用接口进行调用，且没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作基础结构代码。

trans-unit.target: 要求值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;权限值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the invoked method.
trans-unit.target: 获取被调用方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the invoked method.
trans-unit.target: 被调用方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: The following example code shows a custom proxy that overrides `RealProxy.Invoke` in order to write the name of the method to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例代码演示自定义代理该替代`RealProxy.Invoke`为了方法的名称写入控制台。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方通过引用接口进行调用，且没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作基础结构代码。

trans-unit.target: 要求值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;权限值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Gets an object containing the method signature.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含方法签名的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object containing the method signature.
trans-unit.target: 包含方法签名的对象。

trans-unit.source: All the current implementations of <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage> return an array of <xref:System.Type> objects containing the parameter types of the method.
trans-unit.target: 所有当前实现<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage>返回的数组<xref:System.Type>对象又包含该方法的参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方通过引用接口进行调用，且没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.target: 用于操作基础结构代码。

trans-unit.target: 要求值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;权限值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the full <see cref="T:System.Type" /> name of the specific object that the call is destined for.
trans-unit.target: 获取要将该调用发送到的特定对象的完整 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 名称。

trans-unit.source: The full <see cref="T:System.Type" /> name of the specific object that the call is destined for.
trans-unit.target: 要将该调用发送到的特定对象的完整 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 名称。

trans-unit.target: 要求值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;权限值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the URI of the specific object that the call is destined for.
trans-unit.target: 获取要将该调用发送到的特定对象的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The URI of the remote object that contains the invoked method.
trans-unit.target: 包含被调用方法的远程对象的 URI。
